title: AI Assisted Programming Decreases the Productivity of Experienced Developers by Increasing Technical Debt and Maintenance Burden
relevance_note: Examines negative productivity impacts and technical debt accumulation from AI coding assistants.

title: A Review of Research on AI Assisted Code Generation and AI Driven Code Review
relevance_note: Systematic review of AI code generation and review literature.

title: Assessing the Quality of GitHub Copilot’s Code Generation
relevance_note: Empirical evaluation of correctness and reliability of Copilot-generated code.

title: Developers’ Experience with Generative AI: First Insights from an Empirical Mixed Methods Field Study
relevance_note: Field study examining developer perceptions and workflow changes with generative AI.

title: Empirical Analysis of AI Assisted Code Generation Tools Impact on Code Quality Security and Developer Productivity
relevance_note: Controlled experiment comparing productivity and quality impacts of multiple AI coding tools.

title: Evaluating the Code Quality of AI Assisted Code Generation Tools: An Empirical Study on GitHub Copilot Amazon CodeWhisperer and ChatGPT
relevance_note: Compares code quality across multiple AI coding assistants.

title: Examining the Use and Impact of an AI Code Assistant on Developer Productivity and Experience in the Enterprise
relevance_note: Enterprise-level field study on AI coding assistant productivity and developer experience.

title: Expectation vs Experience: Evaluating the Usability of Code Generation Tools Powered by Large Language Models
relevance_note: Usability study comparing expectations and real-world use of LLM code generation tools.

title: How AI Impacts Skill Formation
relevance_note: Investigates how AI assistance affects developer learning and skill acquisition.

title: Measuring GitHub Copilot’s Impact on Productivity
relevance_note: Industry-style analysis of Copilot productivity improvements based on observational data.

title: On the Robustness of Code Generation Techniques: An Empirical Study on GitHub Copilot
relevance_note: Evaluates robustness of Copilot under varied input prompts.

title: Performance Analysis of AI Generated Code: A Case Study of Copilot Chat CodeLLaMa and DeepSeek Coder Models
relevance_note: Analyzes performance and efficiency of AI-generated code across multiple models.

title: The Good and Bad of AI Tools in Novice Programming Education
relevance_note: Examines learning outcomes of novice programmers using AI tools.

title: The Impact of AI on Developer Productivity: Evidence from GitHub Copilot
relevance_note: Controlled experiment measuring Copilot’s effect on task completion time.

title: The Impact of Generative AI on Collaborative Open Source Software Development: Evidence from GitHub Copilot
relevance_note: Studies Copilot’s influence on collaborative open-source development productivity.
